title: Person of Interest 3x03 Root's escape
author: George Finch
comment: Amy Acker was brilliant as Root.
That "Shhhhh" part was the best. Badass Root.
For some reason, Root just reloading like not a care in the world while under fire made me think of Harley Quinn...which is funny considering this is happening in a psych ward.
I love how she puts the magazine in backwards and so nonchalantly just takes it out and reverses it without a care in the world.
The Dr. should write a book, "10 Steps to Becoming a Happy, Well Adjusted, Homicidal Maniac."
